video_title: 4 Harmful Traits in Toxic and Fake Friends
transcript:
building real and authentic friendships
are always hard have you ever wondered
if you have fake or toxic friends here
are four harmful traits to look out for
number one they live to put you down if
anything they'll like it when you're
miserable number two they like to
exclude you they tend to ditch you last
minute and exclude you in future plans
number three they only need you when
it's convenient in other words they use
you for their own benefits and number
four they fail at keeping promises which
means the words are way louder than
their actions so do you have any toxic
and freak friends in your life
